TopicTitle: [0.25] Lionhead Aerospace Inc. - Icarus v0.4 updated

Articles.Content:
Mods updated to 0.20 except rovers, I encountered issues about them.

Not my favorite parts of your addons!

Thank you Yogui87. Downloading now. Didn't see the MEM on Spaceport. Are you planning on updating that as well?

I'm doing it ASAP.

You Sir are one of The Bests! You have my eternal gratitude. Just one other question, I'm wondering if you are going to do a version without the Kerbalnauts being visible in the windows? No pressure to do one. I'm just wondering.

You Sir are one of The Bests! You have my eternal gratitude. Just one other question, I'm wondering if you are going to do a version without the Kerbalnauts being visible in the windows? No pressure to do one. I'm just wondering.

It's already done ^^ in the upcoming update. It's uploading now.

That's awesome/C'est chouette! You, mon ami, are one of the best modders here, there is no doubt about this

It's already done ^^ in the upcoming update. It's uploading now.

Thank you Yogui. The Eagle has landed!

C'est chouette!

I didn't hear someone say "c'est chouette" in ages XD you made my day x)

I didn't hear someone say "c'est chouette" in ages XD you made my day x)

Damn you online translators!

Qu'est-ce que c'est "chouette"? Je ne sais pas....

(Be warned: my level of French is "you'll understand what I'm saying, but I'll probably sound slightly brain damaged to you..." I only studied it for five years, too.... Le sigh.)

Je pense que "an owl".

Anyway, how do you say "that's cool" in French?

Qu'est-ce que c'est "chouette"? Je ne sais pas....

(Be warned: my level of French is "you'll understand what I'm saying, but I'll probably sound slightly brain damaged to you..." I only studied it for five years, too.... Le sigh.)

Yeah, "une chouette" means an owl but it also means "it's cool". It was mostly used when I was kid in the 90's

Je pense que "an owl".

Anyway, how do you say "that's cool" in French?

And nowadays, to say it's cool and depending on people, we say "c'est cool", "ÃƒÂ§a dÃƒÂ©chire" (could be translated as "it rocks"). There's a lot of way of saying it. Yogui as probably other expression than me because he's french and I'm belgian, an other belgian from the other side of Belgium would probably say it in a different way, same as a french from an other side of France would say it in a different way than Yogui.
Be happy yogui didn't release MEM earlier. I caught something he had missed. CSM ran out of fuel after 3 seconds of full throttle.
